channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the Yuzhen Li's Blog on Yuzhen Li's Blog

item.title: Mastering SQL Window Functions: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: SQL window functions are one of the most powerful and flexible tools available to analysts and developers. They allow for sophisticated calculations across rows of data while preserving the individual rows, which makes them ideal for a wide range of use cases, from ranking and cumulative sums to moving averages and comparisons.

item.title: A SQL Practical Challenge on Salary Analysis
item.description: Recently, I encountered an interesting SQL challenge. The task required using window functions to analyze employee salaries within departments. This is a powerful yet sometimes tricky feature in SQL. Here is the problem description and how I solved it.

item.title: Build a Personal Blog‚Äî1. Install Hugo, Git, Configure the Blowfish Theme
item.description: Why Rebuild # Recently, I‚Äôve been preparing for the AWS SAA exam and learning new technologies through side projects. I want to document this journey. Since all the previous blog files were on an old computer in China and the GitHub repository only had public content, I decided to restart my blog as a way to practice writing and keep records.

item.title: Build a Personal Blog‚Äî2. Customizing the Blowfish Theme

item.title: Build a Personal Blog‚Äî3. Deploying with GitHub Pages
item.description: We aim to host the static website generated by Hugo using GitHub Pages service, which allows us to avoid maintaining our own server and ensures more stability and security. Therefore, we need to upload the static web files generated by Hugo to the GitHub Pages repository.

item.title: Build a Personal Blog‚Äî4. How to Bind a Custom Domain to Your GitHub Pages Blog
item.description: Deploying a personal blog on GitHub Pages has been up and running for some time now, and I have been using the default domain username.github.io. Recently, I finally purchased a 10-year domain on Tencent Cloud for less than 10 pounds.

item.title: How to Automatically Collect Heterogeneous Database Table Directories | Analysis of Patent CN111339081A
item.description: With the growth of enterprise data, managing and integrating multiple databases has become a significant challenge. Patent CN111339081A , titled “Automatic collection method and system for table directory of heterogeneous database”, offers a highly automated solution that boosts data extraction efficiency by up to 70% and reduces manual deployment and verification time by 90%.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Profile # I graduated as a master student with distinction from the University of Birmingham in Computer Science. I am very fortunate to have been supervised by Prof Peter Hancox for my thesis on Fine-grained Sentiment Analysis of Yelp-review and Exploring Multi-class Imbalanced Datas.
